<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Ruffian](/NPCs.aspx?ID=888)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Using their strength to bully others into submission, ruffians often work as bodyguards and enforcers for powerful criminals like charlatans and fences.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Ruffian](/NPCs.aspx?ID=888)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 209</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (10 bullets), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 32

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +9,
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +8 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +8 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Brutal Beating**   The ruffian's brutality shakes foes' confidence. When the ruffian deals damage on a critical hit, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), and the ruffian can knock the target up to 10 feet away (this is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451)).

**Snagging Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Trigger** The ruffian has one hand free, and its target is within reach of that hand; **Effect** The ruffian makes a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If this Strike hits, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of the ruffian's next turn or until it leaves the ruffian's reach, whichever comes first.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The ruffian deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
